title: ICE: Compiling tracing-appender v0.2.0 in rsadsb

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: regression-from-stable-to-nightly
labels.description: Performance or correctness regression from stable to nightly.

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: E-needs-mcve
labels.description: Call for participation: This issue needs a Minimal Complete and Verifiable Example

body:
Hey! Just got this ICE in my code. I was building my project `adsb_deku` and was using this commit: https://github.com/rsadsb/adsb_deku/pull/118/commits/70343dbc7186c827fe4cab32a93122460ac947b6 Looks like it crashed trying: ` Compiling tracing-appender v0.2.0` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.61.0-nightly (52b34550a 2022-03-15) binary: rustc commit-hash: 52b34550aca5f7dd7e152f773e3ab786acb86f6f commit-date: 2022-03-15 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.61.0-nightly LLVM version: 14.0.0 ``` ### Error output ``` thread 'rustc' panicked at 'assertion failed: !value.has_escaping_bound_vars()', /rustc/52b34550aca5f7dd7e152f773e3ab786acb86f6f/compiler/rustc_middle/src/ty/sty.rs:1089:9 ```
Backtrace
